info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 24 at 2:12AM EDT until August 24 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WAYNE...SOUTHWESTERN OAKLAND...SOUTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON AND NORTHEASTERN WASHTENAW COUNTIES... At 212 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Salem, or 8 miles southwest of Novi, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Northville around 220 AM EDT. Dixboro around 225 AM EDT. Ypsilanti and Canton around 230 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Island Lake State Recreation Area, New Hudson, Lakeland, Plymouth, Wixom and Westland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
